questions.author: Erik P.
questions.content: What should I get for lunch?

questions.author: Erik C.
questions.content: What's the temperaure of the sun?
questions.notes: It's really bright today and I'm sweating more than usual..

questions.author: Erik B.
questions.content: Should I be concerned about the mole on my toe?
questions.notes: It's huge. Like half dollar big.
